name: Emil M. Petriu
content: Emil M. Petriu Emil M. Petriu Dr. Eng., P. Eng.,  F'IEEE, F'CAE, F'EIC Professor see Dr. Petriu's profile at: NSERC Synergy Award for Innovation, photo - 2015 IEEE Donald G. Fink Prize Paper Award - 2003 Research Interests: ·   Bio-Inspired AI and Robotics ·   Intelligent Sensor Systems ·   Human-Computer Interaction ·   Fuzzy Control ·   Neural Networks ·   Fault Tolerant Systems Biography Graduate Theses Publications Presentations In the News BioIn Robotics Lab Google Scholar Profile Links of Interest University of Ottawa School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science 800 King Edward, room STE-5041 Ottawa, Ontario, Canada, K1N 6N5 Tel: (613) 562-5800 x 2132 Fax: (613) 562-5664 petriu@uottawa.ca Copyright © 2001 Université d'Ottawa / University of Ottawa Webmestre / Webmaster
